name: Jumping Run
description:
Run Run Run and Run!
Jump Jump Jump and Jump!
Do you like endless game?
Do you like jumping game?
Do you like running game?
Do you like double jump?

Play as a cute little pony jumping over obstacle in this game "Jumping Run" and have fun with just one finger.
All you need to do is just tap with your finger to make pony do the jump and double jump.
This game might not easy as it appearance. You have to jump over obstacle without hitting it and don't fall down to the sea below.
Can you escape from the sucker.
Can you break your hi score.
You have to try it for yourself now and have fun.
